trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000010_PIPIN<tab>Pray join me in welcoming our Scion allies, but recently returned from their mission to the Far East. We have been most eager to hear a firsthand account of your time there, eventful as we understand it was.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000020_ALISAIE<tab>Very well, allow me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000030_RAUBAHN<tab>...Such victories are rarely won without sacrifice. But the prize is worth the price. Doma free, after all these years.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000040_CONRAD<tab>Bloody hells... Flooding their own castle for a better chance at victory... We could learn a thing or two from that lad.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000050_PIPIN<tab>Our agents report a flurry of communications between Garlemald and Ala Mhigo in recent days. 'Tis plain they are in the midst of deliberating their response to the Doman uprising.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000060_RAUBAHN<tab>Good. Every imperial unit in occupied territory will be on the lookout for civil unrest. The fear of leaving critical locations undefended will make commanders think twice about committing their forces─giving us a chance to seize the initiative.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000070_CONRAD<tab>We have a chance, aye─mayhap the last one we're ever gonna get. While we've done our best to rebuild the Resistance, the imperials have only increased their efforts to root out sympathizers.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000080_CONRAD<tab>If we keep on playing for smaller prizes, it's only a matter of time before they crush us again. And that we won't come back from.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000090_PIPIN<tab>A swift advance seems best for all concerned. Not least poor Mistress Krile.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000100_RAUBAHN<tab>Then let us waste no more time. The campaign for Ala Mhigan liberation begins now!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000110_RAUBAHN<tab>Our first objective will be to capture Castellum Velodyna. Take the bridge, and the whole of the Fringes will be ours. From there, we can push east towards the Peaks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000120_RAUBAHN<tab>I name this operation Rhalgr's Beacon. For as Rhalgr once sent His star to guide our ancestors to these lands, so too shall it see us home!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000130_CONRAD<tab>It's begun, then.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000140_MNAAGO<tab>Good. It's the waiting that drives me mad. Standing around, knowing what's to come. I'll never get used to it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000150_LYSE<tab>Calm down, Naago. You're making her nervous.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000160_LYSE<tab>We've come this far, haven't we? We just need to make it the rest of the way!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000170_MNAAGO<tab>Right!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000180_CONRAD<tab>Looks like the bastards went for the bait. The bridge is ours for the taking!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000190_CONRAD<tab>Now remember, M'naago: I want you to make for the tower as soon as you see an opening and get that flag flying. We'll see to the fighting.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000200_MNAAGO<tab>I won't let you down, sir!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000210_CONRAD<tab>Come, then! Rhalgr's star shall burn bright this day!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000220_FORDOLA<tab>Gods damn you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000230_LYSE<tab>No more running. No more hiding. Let's finish this!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000240_LYSE<tab>Look! The flag!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000250_CONRAD<tab>The bridge is ours! Ala Mhigo, Ala Mhigo, Ala Mhigo!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000260_ARENVALD<tab>[RALLYING CRY]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000270_ANANTASOLDIER<tab>[RALLYING CRY]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000280_FORDOLA<tab>Stand your ground! It's not over yet!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000281_RAUBAHN<tab>[LOUD ROAR]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000290_RAUBAHN<tab>Hark you, brothers and sisters! The bridge is ours!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000300_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Velodyna is fallen!? Impossible!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000310_RAUBAHN<tab>We have them on the run! Forward! No mercy!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000320_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Regroup, regroup... We have to regroup! All units─ Fall back!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000330_SKULLSOLDIERC<tab>Commander! The 4th Cohort has been routed! We'll be at the mercy of the enemy's reinforcements if we don't fall back now!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000340_FORDOLA<tab>Idiot! We have the stronger force by far! Don't be taken in by their tricks! Or would you rather tell Zenos you lost to this rabble!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000350_SKULLSOLDIERC<tab>No, but if the snakes betray us in the confusion, we'll have no way out! I'm begging you, Commander─give the order, or we'll all die here!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000360_FORDOLA<tab>...As common traitors who drank of muddied waters. For all the good it did us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000370_FORDOLA<tab>Skulls, with me! The day is theirs, and so is this bastard bridge. Someone bring the snake!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000380_LYSE<tab>Damn it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000390_CONRAD<tab>Let them go, Lyse! We've done what we came here to do. That's enough for now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000400_LYSE<tab>...I suppose. It's our first victory, isn't it? And that has to be worth something.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000410_MNAAGO<tab>Ah, you've come. Welcome, friends, to my village. My home.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000420_ALPHINAUD<tab>How fare your people?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000430_MNAAGO<tab>Good, all things considered. Better than the Ananta, at any rate... They've sent an emissary. I'll take you to her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000440_LYSE<tab>We're here to help. Will you tell us what happened?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000450_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Aye. It began with a quarrel between the imperials and the Qalyana.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000460_MNAAGO<tab>The Qalyana are another Ananta tribe─the strongest and the most influential.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000470_MNAAGO<tab>Unlike the Vira, they want no part of our troubles. They swore fealty to the Empire and were content to remain within their borders.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000480_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Jussst ssso. The Qalyana forsssook their pride and the fight, and yielded to Garlemald long ago.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000490_VIRASOLDIER<tab>But then a new commander was sssent to hold the black bridge. She demanded the Qalyana sssurrender a hossstage, thisss Butcher.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000500_LYSE<tab>Fordola. It doesn't make sense, though... The Vira are the ones working with the Resistance. Why would she threaten the Qalyana?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000510_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Because she is ignorant, like all imperials. She knows not the difference between Qalyana and Vira, nor does she care to learn.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000520_ALPHINAUD<tab>I see. All Fordola knew for sure was that the Resistance would come from the west. She reasoned, therefore, that if the Ananta on the east bank turned their coats, she would be trapped. I take it the Qalyana had no choice but to oblige her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000530_VIRASOLDIER<tab>No, they did not. The imperials left with the Qalyana broodmother's own daughter, Anamika.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000540_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Long days and nightsss she looked out on the black bridge, weeping for her child. Until you came.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000550_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The broodmother knew at once which way the winds would blow. She and her warriors met with the fleeing imperials in the road and demanded that her daughter be returned.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000560_LYSE<tab>Bad idea... Fordola's not the kind to take threats lying down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000570_VIRASOLDIER<tab>You know her well. The Butcher turned her blade to Anamika and bade the Qalyana move aside.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000580_VIRASOLDIER<tab>But the broodmother would not yield.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000590_ALISAIE<tab>I know where this is going...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000600_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The Qalyana sssurrounded the imperials, one of whom, whether out of fear or ssstupidity, cut the child down. There was naught that could be done.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000610_ALISAIE<tab>What madness...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000620_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The true madnesss was yet to come. For in her dessspair, the Qalyana broodmother cried out for her daughter to be ressstored to life. She bessseeched Sri Lakshmi's intercession.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000630_ALPHINAUD<tab>She summoned a primal, then and there?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000640_VIRASOLDIER<tab>That she did, if only for an inssstant. Bereft of courage and honor, the broodmother sssought sssolace in her faith.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000650_VIRASOLDIER<tab>The imperials fled in terror at the sssight of the goddesss, abandoning these lands to the Ananta...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000660_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Now the Qalyana bid usss make pilgrimage, to pay proper ressspectsss. Yet though we Vira revere Sri Lakshmi as the holiessst of the holy, we will not prossstrate ourssselves before Her.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000670_ALISAIE<tab>And so you turned to us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000680_VIRASOLDIER<tab>Aye. All who have fought with the Resissstance have heard tell of the warrior. The eikon-ssslayer.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000690_ALPHINAUD<tab>I believe we have heard enough. Inconvenient though the timing may be, if a primal has indeed been summoned, we can scarce afford to ignore it. We must needs discuss how best to resolve this situation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000700_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Why, Missstresss... Why does my Anamika ssslumber ssstill?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000710_LAKSHMI<tab>Look thee on her face, sssupplicant. Thy prayer hath been anssswered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000720_LAKSHMI<tab>Flesh sssundered hath been made whole. Blood ssspilt runneth through her veins. Breath ssstolen filleth her breassst.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000730_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>But she hears not her mother's words, nor sssees her mother's face! She...she is sssilent...and empty...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000740_LAKSHMI<tab>Only the vesssel may be remade. Not so the flame which flickered within. Her soul hath been scattered to the four winds.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000750_ALISAIE<tab>Now do you see her promises for what they are!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000760_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie! Have you gone mad!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000770_ALISAIE<tab>Mayhap I have! But I refuse to stand by and watch yet another tragedy unfold!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000780_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Who intrudes upon thisss sssacred ground!? Imperials thirsssting for blood!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000790_ALISAIE<tab>No! We come not to shed blood but to save you from the false god who would lead you astray!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000800_ALISAIE<tab>I understand how you feel, I do. You loved her with all your heart, but when the moment came, you still couldn't save her. The anguish, the anger... I know it only too well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000810_ALISAIE<tab>But I also know where this path leads! To embrace a primal is to condemn yourself to an endless cycle of despair. You will never know peace!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000820_LAKSHMI<tab>A worm-eaten heart may find peace and ssserenity in ssservice. In beauty and grace. Thisss hath ever been my promissse. Naught elssse.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000830_ALISAIE<tab>You tempt them with visions of things that can never be, and leave them bereft and wanting!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000840_ALISAIE<tab>No illusion, however sweet, can change the fact that your daughter is gone. Remember her as she was! Do not suffer this piteous shade to tarnish her memory!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000850_LYSE<tab>For every prayer that primal “answers,” it'll demand payment in kind. Do you have any idea how many more Ananta will die to feed its hunger for crystals!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000860_LAKSHMI<tab>They would have thee sssuffer man's ssspite and live in fear. Far better to dwell in my beauteousss dream than endure ssso ugly a reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000870_LYSE<tab>She's wrong! We hate the Empire as much as you! If you'd just listen─

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000880_LAKSHMI<tab>Poor, misssguided children. I would ssspare you the tormentsss of thisss cruel and misshapen world. Come, basssk in my radiance. Let it fill your heartsss and free you from your burdens.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000890_ALISAIE<tab>[FRUSTRATED GRUNT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000900_LAKSHMI<tab>Abide in misery then, fools. The Ananta are more deserving of my blesssing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000910_LAKSHMI<tab>Leave these lands and my dreamers be. I will not warn you a second time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000920_LYSE<tab>You did it again. You saved them. I just wish I could've been more help...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000930_LYSE<tab>So...it looks like the Ananta did have a mountain of crystals after all. Like every other tribe. Gods, we're all such slaves to our weaknesses...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000940_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>You! You ssslew our Missstresss! She was our hope, our sssalvation! Is there no end to your cruelty!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000950_LYSE<tab>Listen to me, please! I know that you're only trying to protect yourselves because you feel frightened and alone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000960_LYSE<tab>But that's how we all feel, don't you see? If we could just turn to each other for help instead of the gods, I'm sure we could find a way to live in peace!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000970_LYSE<tab>Your crystals are important to you, aren't they? Reflections of your souls, right? Well, you shouldn't have to sacrifice something so precious to a primal...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000980_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Who are you to quessstion our choice? You who fight without fear? We wish only to live in peace, and if thisss be the price we must pay, then ssso be it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_000990_LYSE<tab>I know there's nothing I can say to convince you. But I hope that one day you look back and see we only ever wanted the same thing.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001000_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Begone, damn you! Ssspare me your hollow words and leave me to mourn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001010_LYSE<tab>I'll go...but it doesn't mean I'm giving up.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001020_LYSE<tab>Gyr Abania is our home too, and one way or another, we're going to have to learn to live together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001030_LYSE<tab>Come on. Alphinaud and Alisaie are waiting.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001039_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the Royal Palace of Ala Mhigo...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001040_GARLEANLEADERA<tab>(-Imperial Tribunus Militum-)Ah, the savage returns. And with her tail firmly between her legs. Beaten by beastmen, I hear.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001050_GARLEANLEADERC<tab>(-Imperial Pilus Prior-)'Twas a shameful display, by all accounts. She may have curried the viceroy's favor with her bold promises, but in the end, she's just another plodding bungler like the rest of her kind.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001060_GARLEANLEADERA<tab>(-Imperial Tribunus Militum-)Strange, you would think him a better judge of character. Then again, I hear she's not averse to a more physical mode of persuasion.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001070_GARLEANLEADERC<tab>(-Imperial Pilus Prior-)Hah, I thought she rose through the ranks rather quickly. But no longer. If only she had been content with her lot, she might have lived to see the morrow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001080_FORDOLA<tab>Fordola rem Lupis, commander of the Crania Lupi, reporting as ordered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001090_ZENOS<tab>...Why do you tremble so?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001100_ZENOS<tab>Could it be that the Empire's Butcher is afraid? That she who walks with death is terrified of her own?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001110_FORDOLA<tab>I am terrified of dying having achieved naught. Gladly would I give my life to win a great victory on the battlefield, had I but the strength.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001120_ZENOS<tab>Alas, you do not. Indeed, you are weak. And born of this weakness is a blind fervor. A raging inferno which threatens to consume not only you, but everyone around you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001130_FORDOLA<tab>Yes, my lord.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001140_ZENOS<tab>You were defeated by the Resistance on several occasions. You misjudged the Ananta and spurred them into summoning an eikon. Have you anything to say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001150_FORDOLA<tab>I do not, my lord. My failures are my own. I am prepared to accept your judgment.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001160_ZENOS<tab>And that is very admirable. However, I've had enough of this dumb show. Give voice to that hunger I see in your eyes, or I will pluck them from your head.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001170_FORDOLA<tab>I...I want...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001180_FORDOLA<tab>I want to make them pay! All of them! Everyone who ever mocked or looked down on me─I want the power to make them pay!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001190_ZENOS<tab>...Hm. Very well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001200_ZENOS<tab>Then I shall give you a chance. A chance to transcend your mortal limits. Assuming, that is, you are prepared to wager your life for such power.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001210_FORDOLA<tab>Transcend, my lord...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001220_FORDOLA<tab>I came here prepared to die. Tell me what I must do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001230_LYSENARRATION<tab>I remember how they laughed. Alliance and Resistance soldiers, eager for battle, trading jokes as we marched east towards the Peaks...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001240_LYSENARRATION<tab>Beyond this last line of defenses lay the Lochs and the city. Breaching it would be no small feat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001250_LYSENARRATION<tab>But we beat the imperials back, just like that, and we liberated a village. The first of many...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001259_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, deep within an imperial research facility...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001260_FORDOLA<tab>My...my head...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001270_ZENOS<tab>Let us see...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001280_ZENOS<tab>So...she lives. Impressive...or merely lucky. Though that too may prove a useful trait.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001290_FORDOLA<tab>My lord...what have you done to me...?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001300_DRUSUS<tab>Though we Garleans are intellectually and physiologically superior in almost all respects, we lack the hereditary traits required for the reliable manipulation of aether─hence our unique inability to wield magicks.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001310_DRUSUS<tab>This deficiency, for want of a better word, saw us subjected to decades of oppression by the lesser races, and we were eventually driven to seek shelter in the cold northern reaches of Ilsabard.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001320_DRUSUS<tab>Fortunately, said region was replete with vast deposits of ceruleum, which proved instrumental in the development of magitek: a revolutionary technology conceived to compensate for our disadvantage.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001330_DRUSUS<tab>It was with magitek that we grew strong─that our nation became an empire. Yet ultimately, this was an extrinsic solution to an intrinsic problem. What I wanted was not a crude device to be used in lieu of magic.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001340_DRUSUS<tab>Through modification of the Garlean genome, I argued that it might be possible to enhance a subject's ability to manipulate aether, effectively empowering them to wield magicks. Alas, my theories were met with consternation in the imperial court. Only Lord Zenos, with commendable foresight and wisdom, deigned to support my research.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001350_FORDOLA<tab>...You gave me this treatment? But I'm not Garlean.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001360_ZENOS<tab>Ala Mhigan, through and through.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001370_ZENOS<tab>What you have been granted is far greater than mere magic. Before that lesser light, it is as a second sun.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001380_DRUSUS<tab>I am informed that Ala Ghiri was recently occupied by the Resistance, and that an attack on Specula Imperatoris is considered imminent. This could provide an ideal opportunity to test her performance in the field.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001390_ZENOS<tab>Your...Skulls, was it? They have joined the garrison at the watchtower?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001400_FORDOLA<tab>...Yes, my lord. By your leave, I would rendezvous with them and lead a counterattack against the insurgents.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001410_ZENOS<tab>No. Even were you to leave now, you would not arrive in time. There is another duty I would entrust to you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001420_THANCRED<tab>...Found you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001430_RAUBAHN<tab>Ho! You've improved, lad!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001440_PIPIN<tab>Come now, Father. You lured the fool onto my blade, and do not try to deny it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001450_RAUBAHN<tab>Our work here is all but done. What of Conrad and his men?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001460_PIPIN<tab>They are for the main tower. The Skulls have offered fierce resistance thus far, but Conrad seems to believe he can convince them to lay down their arms...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001470_RAUBAHN<tab>Then we will tend to the stragglers down below. With me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001480_FORDOLA<tab>Report.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001490_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Enemy forces have overrun the lower facilities, and appear to be mounting an assault on the main tower. We have already received a request for reinforcements.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001500_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>A unit of legionaries has been mustered and is ready to depart. They await your orders, Commander.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001510_FORDOLA<tab>Stand down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001520_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Commander?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001530_FORDOLA<tab>Tell them to stand down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001540_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Commander, if I may! Our people─your people are still in there! They will be slaughtered!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001550_FORDOLA<tab>You think I don't know that!? I want nothing more than to help them─to lead the bloody charge─but I have my orders!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001560_FORDOLA<tab>Lord Zenos said no reinforcements. He would have us use the main cannon to destroy the installation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001570_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>What...kill our own soldiers!? You must be mistaken!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001580_FORDOLA<tab>Mayhap you'd like to ask Lord Zenos yourself?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001590_FORDOLA<tab>I thought not. Initiate the firing sequence.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001600_FORDOLA<tab>Wars are won on the backs of the dead. Theirs and ours. There is no truth but this. We must remain firm and resolute, and always, always do our duty. Now, give the order!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001610_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>Initiate firing sequence!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001620_GARLEANHARPOONER<tab>Aye, aye, initiating firing sequence! Release safety locks...deploy main cannon!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001630_FORDOLA<tab>Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin... For us. For our people. For our future.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001640_GARLEANOFFICER<tab>I need you to confirm the target, Commander.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001650_FORDOLA<tab>Specula Imperatoris, main tower. Fire when ready.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001660_RAUBAHN<tab>What in the seven hells!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001670_PIPIN<tab>Long-range artillery?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001680_RAUBAHN<tab>Those treacherous bastards... Their people were still fighting! Full retreat, now! Relay the orders!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001690_PIPIN<tab>Understood!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001700_PIPIN<tab>All forces, retreat! I repeat: all forces, retreat!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001710_LYSE<tab>Conrad! Conrad! Speak to me!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001720_ALPHINAUD<tab>It...it was all so sudden. Conrad had just convinced the last few Skulls to surrender, when...when we heard the bang, and...and everything started to shake...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001730_ALPHINAUD<tab>We carried the survivors to safety, but Conrad is... We have done what we can for him. All that remains is to pray.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001740_CONRAD<tab>Ugh...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001750_LYSE<tab>Conrad!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001760_CONRAD<tab>Is...is that you, Lyse? Can't...can't see a damn thing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001770_CONRAD<tab>Well, that's that, then. Time's up.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001780_LYSE<tab>What are you talking about!? You'll be on your feet before you know it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001790_CONRAD<tab>It's all right, Lyse. I've lived long enough. But listen... I want...I want you to lead the Resistance in my stead.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001800_LYSE<tab>Don't say another word! You'll recover─we'll recover! We'll bring freedom to Ala Mhigo together! We're not going to stop here!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001810_CONRAD<tab>No...no, you won't. Everything we've built, everyone we've brought together...I know you'll show them the way...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001820_CONRAD<tab>You've got it in you, Lyse. Not because you're Curtis's daughter, or Yda's sister, but because...because you're you. Because you're you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001830_LYSE<tab>Conrad...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001840_CONRAD<tab>Lead them to victory. To freedom.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001850_LYSE<tab>I will, Conrad. I will. I promise.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001859_SYSTEM_NONE_VOICE<tab>Meanwhile, in the chaos of Castrum Abania...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001860_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Next round! Double the charge!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001870_ESTINIEN<tab>Come, Nidhogg. We are needed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001880_GARLEANHARPOONER<tab>That's the ceruleum pipeline!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001890_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Impossible! How can one man─ Shoot the bastard! Shoot him!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001900_ESTINIEN<tab>Heh. My lance has slain far greater beasts.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001910_ESTINIEN<tab>...You're welcome, boy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001920_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>Notify all units─I want that intruder found! And get the engineers to fix my bloody cannon!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001930_G3F1IMPERIALCENTURION<tab>The savages are coming!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001940_ALISAIE<tab>Are you all right!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001950_ALISAIE<tab>Ah...I think that answers my question. We have accomplished our objectives as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001955_ALPHINAUD<tab>Understood. We're on our way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse's unit should be advancing upon the fire control center in the command tower. Let us join them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001970_ALPHINAUD<tab>Lyse! Thank the Twelve you're all right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001980_LYSE<tab>And you! There's the control center. Let's hit them hard and fast. Ready?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_001990_FORDOLA<tab>They're here!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002000_LYSE<tab>It was you, wasn't it... Wasn't it!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002010_FORDOLA<tab>Aye, I gave the order to fire.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002020_LYSE<tab>It was over! The Skulls had surrendered! No one else had to die! And you killed them! Your own people! Your own comrades!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002030_FORDOLA<tab>You're right. I killed them. Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin, all the rest─trained and fought with every last one of them. Good soldiers to a man.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002040_FORDOLA<tab>I gave the order that led to their deaths...and I knew exactly what I was doing.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002050_LYSE<tab>But why!? Why would you do that!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002060_FORDOLA<tab>They died so that all Ala Mhigans could live free. That was all we ever wanted.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002070_FORDOLA<tab>We made a promise that we would do whatever it took so that one day...one day the imperials would learn to accept us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002080_FORDOLA<tab>But everything comes at a price. And if you haven't got the means to pay, then you pay with blood.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002090_FORDOLA<tab>Service guarantees citizenship, but citizenship guarantees naught. It's not enough to do your part, oh no. You have to run faster, fight harder, kill more and more and more─and only then will you be equal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002100_FORDOLA<tab>That's just how it is out here in the provinces. You buy your freedom with blood─there is no other way!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002110_LYSE<tab>Shut up! Shut your mouth! You don't get to talk about freedom! You killed your own! They trusted you and you killed them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002120_LYSE<tab>Murderer! Butcher! Traitor!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002130_ALISAIE<tab>Lyse!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002140_LYSE<tab>Gotcha!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002150_ALISAIE<tab>Huh!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002160_FORDOLA<tab>I know what you can do. I've already seen it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002170_ALPHINAUD<tab>Alisaie!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002180_FORDOLA<tab>Even so, the odds are against me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002190_LYSE<tab>Coward! Get back here!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002200_FORDOLA<tab>Hero! Lord Zenos invites you to join him for the royal hunt, to be hosted at the palace. You may bring your horde, if you like. All are welcome.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002210_ALPHINAUD<tab>She'll be all right, but we'll need to carry her. Will you help me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Thank you. Lyse, I leave matters here in your hands.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002230_LYSE<tab>Uh, right...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002240_RAUBAHN<tab>I wanted to show you this house. My house.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002250_LYSE<tab>You mean...this is where you grew up?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002260_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye. Not much to look at, is it?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002270_RAUBAHN<tab>Same could be said of the village. It was damn near impossible to live off the land, barren as it was─which is why so many of us traded our plowshares for swords.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002280_RAUBAHN<tab>Swords and uniforms, mind. We became military men. Tensions were rising between Ala Mhigo and the Empire, and there was always a need for more soldiers to watch the border. 'Twas only a matter of time before the first skirmishes broke out.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002290_RAUBAHN<tab>It is a frightening thing to face magitek armor for the first time. But after a lot of trial and error, I found ways to bring them down. After a few victories, people even said I had a knack for it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002300_RAUBAHN<tab>And then one day they hit us. Hard. I was wounded and sent home to recover. Back here...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002310_CURTIS<tab>Will you remain silent for fear of the mad king's vengeance? Of his eyes and ears in the shadows and his knives in the dark? You who call this “living” dishonor our nation─it is but a slow death!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002320_CURTIS<tab>Liberty or death. Liberty or death! If this be your creed, then raise up your hands! Raise up your voices! Together we will tear Theodoric from the throne! Together we will reclaim our freedom!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002330_CURTIS<tab>Sent you home to mend, did they?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002340_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye, sir. Garleans got the better of us. The...the chirurgeons say I'm healing well, so it won't be long now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002350_CURTIS<tab>Liberty or death, is it? Tell me, soldier: what do you think those words mean?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002360_RAUBAHN<tab>We...we must needs be willing to die for liberty?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002370_CURTIS<tab>Spoken like a true patriot. But liberty should not be the end in of itself.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002380_CURTIS<tab>Liberty is the chance to build something better. A stronger, more prosperous home for our people. It's not quick or easy work, and it is never truly finished─but if you neglect it, then sooner or later, you look up to find you've traded one tyrant for another.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002390_RAUBAHN<tab>Well, sir, I...I've never asked for much. Never wanted to live like a king─just wish it were a little bit easier is all. For me and everyone else. And I'm...I'm willing to die for that, if that's what it takes!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002400_CURTIS<tab>Dying is easy, soldier. Living is harder.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002410_CURTIS<tab>Rest. Mend. Regain your strength. You'll need it in the days to come...and mayhap one day we will need it too.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002420_RAUBAHN<tab>Conrad chose you as his successor, Lyse, and I will not gainsay his decision. I have but one question to ask.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002430_RAUBAHN<tab>Liberty or death. Those were Curtis's words, and his creed. Will you swear by your father's creed before your comrades and the gods?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002440_LYSE<tab>Liberty or death... That's all you can hope for in war. Father understood that...and you want to know if I do too.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002450_LYSE<tab>I swear to you, here and now: I will fight until the end, be it liberty or be it death.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002460_LYSE<tab>But the freedom we win must be for every Ala Mhigan─even ones like Fordola, though they may hate us, and the Ananta, though they may fear us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002470_LYSE<tab>We'll fight and we'll talk and we'll find a way to make it work for all of us. Compared to all that, retaking our home will seem like the easy part.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002480_RAUBAHN<tab>Hmm. A good oath. Then there is naught else to say. You are indeed your father's daughter...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002490_LYSE<tab>Sorry to have kept you waiting...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002500_LYSE<tab>Well, what do you think? I know it's a bit old-fashioned...but in a traditional sort of way. Yda wore it whenever she could...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002510_LYSE<tab>Not that I'm pretending to be her or anything! Not again. It's just...if this is the last battle we fight to free Ala Mhigo, then she ought to be a part of it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>It suits you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's not quite your style...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002520_LYSE<tab>It's nice of you to say so. Aaand a bit embarrassing. But mostly nice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002530_LYSE<tab>Oh, I know, right? All these stupid frills everywhere...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002540_LYSE<tab>Well don't just stand there gawping! If you don't like it, just say so!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002550_LYSE<tab>Anyway, the real reason I asked you here was to sneak in a warm-up before the final battle.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04005_002560_LYSE<tab>There's this place I know where monks used to spar as part of their training. Care to join me?
